page.title: 04FARMS-Manor & Bramley Grange
page.content: {Manor Farm}is situated close to the Mexborough Public House in Thorner. ({The land owner was Lord Mexborough)} The farm is run by Mr. Walmesley, his wife and two others. It is a large farm of over 400 acres. Wheat is planted on 121 acres, barley on 120 acres, oil seed rape on 45 acres, potatoes on 20 acres and grass on 95 acres. There are 120 ewes and 150 beef cows. Farm machinery includes a combine harvester and 6 tractors. Most produce is sold at the local markets at Otley and Pannal, the rest feeding the stock. -------------------------------------- {Bramley Grange Farm}at the edge of the village rears hens, sheep, pigs and cattle. They find that the kennel and cattery on the farm is more lucrative than farming!
